programmes.show_description: Crime drama series. Benson investigates a crime of sexual assault from Stone's past. Rollins considers a proposal from Al.
Crime drama series. The murder of a promising new author uncovers secret kept between two reclusive brothers.
Dead Man Walking: Crime series. A nuclear power plant inspector has been poisoned with a lethal dose of radiation and the team races to identify those responsible.
A deputy tries to level with a man who's struggled with addiction for a decade. Security guards at an aquarium warn officers about a man with a gun.
Shop by phone from the comfort of your home.
Ideal World Shopping - For All Your Shopping Needs
A daily round-up of showbiz news and gossip from around the world, focusing on celebrities, movies, music and entertainment.
Jessica works on zoo research for her next book when she's drawn into the murder of a worker's fiance who was killed by snake venom.
Identity Crisis: The accidental discovery of a murder victim during a routine training exercise sparks a hunt for a dangerous criminal.
Leap of Faith: A navy SEAL is shot dead while threatening to throw himself from the top of a building. A known Al Qaeda operative emerges as the main suspect.
Chimera: The death of a sailor on board a ship brings the agents into contact with a deadly virus.
Turnstile Justice: Drama series about lawyers and police. After a mother is killed on the subway, the evidence points towards a recently released psychiatric patient .
Dissonance: Jealousy is the suspected motive when a brilliant young violinist is found murdered.
Stand-off: When a suspect is questioned following the murder of a prisoner, the team wonder whether he was acting on orders from the prison authorities.
White Lie: Detectives Briscoe and Green investigate the murder of a couple, with the trail leading to the wife of an army major involved in the war on drugs.
Whiplash: A murder investigation alerts the detectives to a far-reaching fraud involving staged car accidents.
Director Shepard is killed while trying to clean up a secret mission and Gibbs sets out to find those responsible.
Last Man Standing: US crime drama series. The murder of a petty officer uncovers an internal plot to sell highly classified military information.
Agent Afloat: The murder of a navy officer sparks a major security alert on board an aircraft carrier.
Reese and Fusco become caught up in the gang war between Elias and Dominic as it reaches crisis point. Finch and Root follow a clue to Shaw's whereabouts.
Finch and Root race to save The Machine, which has been located by the rival AI, Samaritan.
The squad searches for two suspects after a Muslim lady is attacked inside a synagogue; Benson is shocked that Rob Miller is out on bail.
Crime drama series. Benson suspects Rob Miller to be responsible for the death of a girl found in Hudson River, but due to lack of evidence she cannot apprehend him.
A young woman accuses a celebrity plastic surgeon and his girlfriend of sexual assault. Benson and the team must decide if she was attacked, or if a sex game went awry.
After two decades of silence, a serial rapist strikes again. SVU is determined to learn the identity of the elusive criminal and bring justice to his multiple victims.
A celebration turns into a crime scene when the birthday girl's stepmother falls to her death and the guests and staff are put under a microscope by the NYPD. Ryan finds a new lead.
After leading police on a slow pursuit, a sharply-dressed driver has a heated talk with another deputy. In spite of her tears, police unravel a woman's lies one-by-one.
Shop by phone from the comfort of your home.
Ideal World Shopping - For All Your Shopping Needs
The Attorney General's Office uncovers new evidence against Danny for shooting Wilder in self-defense, while a slain officer's wife asks Frank to stop her son from joining the police.
An elderly woman is shot in her home while minding her own business. The commissioner has to discipline a disrespectful cop for smoking a cigarette while on the beat.
A woman who is brutally raped by a rich friend is reluctant to press charges. A prominent donor to the NYPD asks Frank for a favor he's reluctant to give.
After Lieutenant Gormley is beaten by a mob, Danny and Frank team up with Detective Abetemarco, who has a personal connection to the neighborhood where the attack happened.
Working from a new location in Los Angeles, the NCIS Office of Special Projects welcomes Callen back to the team and he is immediately directed to solve a kidnapping case.
Special Agent Sam Hanna investigates a drugs deal and discovers that his former SEAL comrades are involved.
An unmanned Predator drone goes missing, and the team must locate it before the remaining missiles are used against the American people.
When an ex-marine is accused of murdering an Iraqi, the team try to get their hands on him before his accusers do.
The team investigate the murder of a North Korean defector who was working on a very sensitive project for the US government.
Callen and the team investigate the demise of a wealthy businessman, who plummeted to his death at a rooftop party.
The team uncovers evidence that determines who shot Callen six months earlier.
An investigation into the murder of a marine Lance Corporal leads Sam and Callen to a dangerous military group.
Forensic scientist Abby Sciuto helps the team when a murder resembles the pattern of a serial killer she has been tracking.
Dylan and Lizzie investigate the case of a prominent divorce lawyer who is found murdered in a bizarre ritual. Dylan and Andy hit a bump in their adoption process.
When an actress accuses a media mogul of attempted rape, Benson finds herself in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse. A change in the squad room puts Carisi in a hard place.
Benson helps a young woman to remember the details and suspects in her rape. In order to learn a new witness interview technique, Rollins and Fin have to experience it first.
US drama series. Benson reaches out to two teenage sisters whose father has been murdered. Rollins goes into labour.
